alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong to severe thunderstorms will be moving into southeast Minnesota between 9 and 10 pm... At 816 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported severe thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waseca to Elmore. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, but possibly gusting 60 to 70 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters and airport wind sensors have reported wind gusts to 70 mph just west of the Interstate 35 corridor in southcentral Minnesota. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down trees and blow around unsecured objects. Prepare now for damaging winds and possible severe weather. Locations impacted by these storms should include Dodge Center, Austin, Hayfield, and Rochester. Other locations include Brookside Campground, Mayville, Rochester Airport and Graves Landing Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
